TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TargetFrameworkAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TargetFrameworkAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TargetFrameworkAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 특정 어셈블리의 컴파일 대상인 .NET Framework의 버전을 식별합니다.

span.span: Identifies the version of the .NET Framework that a particular assembly was compiled against.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 클래스는 어셈블리를 빌드할 대상.NET Framework 런타임 버전을 나타내는 어셈블리에 적용할 수 있는 특성을 제공 합니다.The class provides an attribute that you can apply to an assembly to indicate the version of the .NET Framework runtime against which the assembly was built. 다음 예제에서는 적용 하는 예를 들어는 `TargetFrameworkAttribute` 를 사용 하 여 빌드 되었으면 어셈블리로 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]합니다.For example, the following example applies the `TargetFrameworkAttribute` to an assembly to indicate that it was built using [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.versioning.targetframeworkattribute/cs/declare1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.versioning.targetframeworkattribute/vb/declare1.vb#1)] 클래스 생성자에 단일 매개 변수를 `frameworkName`, 어셈블리를 빌드할 대상.NET Framework 버전을 지정 하는 합니다.The class constructor has a single parameter, `frameworkName`, that specifies the .NET Framework version against which the assembly was built. 이 매개 변수에 매핑되는 속성입니다.This parameter maps to the property. 또한는 특성을 지정할 수는 속성을 적합 한 어셈블리의 클라이언트에 게 표시 하는 것에 대 한 설명이 포함 된.NET Framework 버전 문자열을 제공 합니다.In addition, the attribute can specify a property to provide a more descriptive .NET Framework version string that is suitable for displaying to clients of the assembly. 다음 예제에서는 적용 된 `TargetFrameworkAttribute` 어셈블리에 어셈블리를 사용 하 여 빌드 되었으면 속성 값을 모두 할당 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]합니다.The following example applies the `TargetFrameworkAttribute` to an assembly and assigns both property values to indicate that the assembly was built using [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.versioning.targetframeworkattribute/cs/declare2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.versioning.targetframeworkattribute/vb/declare2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string frameworkName) cil managed

span.span: The version of the .NET Framework against which the assembly was built.

summary.span: 어셈블리가 빌드된 .NET Framework 버전을 지정하여 클래스의 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class by specifying the .NET Framework version against which an assembly was built.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 에 할당 된 문자열의 `frameworkName` 매개 변수는 일반적으로 문자열에서 반환 되는 동일한 형식을 취합니다는 메서드.The string that is assigned to the `frameworkName` parameter generally takes the same form as the string that is returned by the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FrameworkDisplayName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 어셈블리가 빌드된 .NET Framework 버전의 표시 이름을 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets the display name of the .NET Framework version against which an assembly was built.
The display name of the .NET Framework version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 속성은 일반적으로 사용자에 게 표시 하기 위해 적합 한 비교적 긴 설명 문자열을 반환 합니다.The property usually returns a relatively long descriptive string that is suitable for display to a user.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FrameworkName As String
public: property System::String ^ FrameworkName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 특정 어셈블리가 컴파일된 .NET Framework 버전의 이름을 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets the name of the .NET Framework version against which a particular assembly was compiled.
The name of the .NET Framework version with which the assembly was compiled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 속성에 매핑됩니다는 `frameworkName` 의 매개 변수는 생성자입니다.The property maps to the `frameworkName` parameter of the constructor. 압축 된 형식의.NET Framework 버전을 표시 하 고 반환 되는 문자열에 해당 하는 일반적으로 메서드.It represents the .NET Framework version in a compact form and typically corresponds to the string that is returned by the method.
